SELECT c.id, c.name, c.classes, week_from, week_to, weekday, SEC_TO_TIME(time_from) as time_from, SEC_TO_TIME(time_to) as time_to, classroom_id, capacity, now, teacher_id, teacher_name, courseware_url, description FROM course AS c INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM course_choose_log WHERE student_id = #{studentId}) AS chosen ON c.id = chosen.course_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course(id, name, classes, week_from, week_to, weekday, time_from, time_to, classroom_id, capacity, now, teacher_id, teacher_name, courseware_url, description) VALUE (#{id}, #{name}, #{classes}, #{weekFrom}, #{weekTo}, #{weekday}, TIME_TO_SEC(#{timeFrom}), TIME_TO_SEC(#{timeTo}), #{classroomId}, #{capacity}, #{now}, #{teacherId}, #{teacherName}, #{coursewareUrl}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET name = #{name}, classes = #{classes}, week_from = #{weekFrom}, week_to = #{weekTo}, weekday = #{weekday}, time_from = TIME_TO_SEC(#{timeFrom}), time_to = TIME_TO_SEC(#{timeTo}), classroom_id = #{classroomId}, capacity = #{capacity}, now = #{now}, teacher_id = #{teacherId}, teacher_name = #{teacherName}, courseware_url = #{coursewareUrl}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE course SET now = now + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND now < capacity
